fr:frontmatter.fr:title: Identity Type › Path Induction / Identification Elimination

fr:mainmatter.fr:p: The identity type is an inductive type, generated by just a reflexivity identification that providing an equality of a term with itself.
A term of a=_Ax is called a identification of a and x, or the path from a to x.
